chart

Source: R/chart.R
chart.Rd

Used to add missing data to input files and customize format

chart(
  data = NULL,
  col_agg = "class",
  chart_type = "all",
  aspect_ratio = 0.75,
  size = 10,
  size_title = NULL,
  theme = NULL,
  ncol = 3,
  scales = "free"
)

Arguments

data

Default = NULL. Dataframe to test and convert.

col_agg

Default = "class". Column to remove and then aggregate by.

chart_type

Default = "all". Choices one or more of "all", "lines", "bar", "lines_diff", "bar_diff"

aspect_ratio

Default = 0.75. aspect ratio

size

Default = 10. text size

size_title

Default = NULL. size_title text

theme

Default = NULL.

ncol

Default = 3. Number of columns.

scales

Default = "free". Choose between "free", "free_y", "free_x", "fixed"
